DKA.Title: تصوير صور الكواكب; Taṣwīr ṣuwar al-kawākib

div.h4:
تصوير صور الكواكب
Taṣwīr ṣuwar al-kawākib
div.p:
Beskrivelse
Illuminations on 75 pages: stars pictured by drawings in colour. Bought either by Carsten Niebuhr (d. 1815) or Peter Forsskål (d. 1763) who were members of the Carsten Niebuhr expedition 1761-1767. Book on astronomy Nashi script Chapter headings in red Described in detail in: Catalogue of Oriental Manuscripts in Danish Collections, vol. 5,3 [pp. 290-294]
